# indexOfSelectedItem()

**Instance Method**

Returns the index of the selected entry.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func indexOfSelectedItem() -> Int
```

## Return Value

The index of the selected entry, or `-1` if no entry is selected.

## Getting Cells and Indices

- **indexOfCell(withTag:)**: Returns the index of the entry whose tag is `tag`.
- **cell(at:)**: Returns the entry at the specified index.

items.description: Returns the index of the entry whose tag is `tag`.
